department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
## Training Facility and Role Players Tender

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: W6399-23DB22/A
* **Modification Number**: 1
* **Publication Date**: November 14, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 30, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* **Trade Agreements**: CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contractor to provide facilities, equipment, and personnel to support a combination of key categories for collective training events, including:

* Land Exercise Effects
* Specialized facilities, platforms, and equipment
* Aviation Exercise Effects
* Subject matter experts
	+ Role Players and Human Intelligence

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Holders of Supply Arrangement W6399-21J415. To obtain a copy of the Request for Supply Arrangement, visit [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).

### Submissions Guidelines

* Bids must be submitted to the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) Bid Receiving Unit specified on page 1 of the bid solicitation.
* Bidders must use the CPC Connect service to submit their bids.
* To open a CPC Connect conversation, send an email to [TPSGC.orreceptiondessoumissions-orbidreceiving.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:TPSGC.orreceptiondessoumissions-orbidreceiving.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) at least six days before the solicitation closing date.
* Bids transmitted by hardcopy to PWGSC will not be accepted.
* Delivery Date: As indicated on page 1 of the bid solicitation.

### Contact Information

* Herb Choquette, (613) 449-8446, [herb.choquette@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:herb.choquette@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
* Kingston Procurement, (613) 566-6162

Note: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.  -->
